posts.post_content:
i might be interested into buy a old reprint t206 wagner for filler the hole in my t206 set.


thx

[quote name="atx840" post=985098]I've seen them cheaper. 

[url]http://www.ebay.com/itm/COBB-EDWARDS-1909-T206-HONUS-WAGNER-ACA-GRADING-AUTHENTIC-/160785274734[/url][/QUOTE]


Lol but only 1 problem, we cant use the best offert buttons, so i cant make my 5$ offert.....:( lol

There was a T206 reprint set created in I believe, the early '60s, that was of the best quality I've seen, but it had very definite reprint characteristics.

There was also a '33 (or '34?) Goudey set created about the same time, maybe a little earlier, that was of scary-nice quality - the Feldman kid was roughing them up and selling them as old reprints, but they were being re-sold as real.  He offered to send me one for free, but I wouldn't give him my mailing address.

If anyone has examples from either of these two reprint sets, I would love to see them.

posts.post_title: A six pack of wagners for under $10
posts.post_content:
[url]http://www.ebay.com/itm/6-DIFFERENT-HONUS-WAGNER-PIEDMONT-SWEET-CAPORAL-T-206-REPRINTS-MATHEWSON-PLANK-/221000437120?pt=US_Baseball&hash=item3374a70d80[/url]

One of these should suit you then sell a five pack.

Frank

PS - Can't bump Monster Numbers for phony Wags

Nelson,
If you buy that lot, I would buy one of the wagners on the top row off you.  Just let me have second pick after you keep the one you like best.

Luke

Chris,

LOL!! i had messaged the stupid ass seller and told him he should be banned from ebay when i first saw it listed!!!so funny...
